unnormalised: Preparations are in full swing for Isha Ambani's Diwali bash on 20/10/2024. Sources say the celebrations will kick off around 8 PM, but knowing the Ambanis, it might stretch till 2 AM the next day, 21/10/2024.
normalised: Preparations are in full swing for Isha Ambani's Diwali bash on twentieth October two thousand and twenty four. Sources say the celebrations will kick off around eight P-M, but knowing the Ambanis, it might stretch till two A-M the next day, twenty first October two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Invitations have apparently already gone out. Word on the street is that it’s a star-studded affair, with Bollywood bigwigs and business tycoons expected to grace the event. The theme is rumoured to be "A Night in Rajasthan," so expect some seriously dazzling traditional outfits.
normalised: Invitations have apparently already gone out. Word on the street is that it’s a star-studded affair, with Bollywood bigwigs and business tycoons expected to grace the event. The theme is rumoured to be "A Night in Rajasthan," so expect some seriously dazzling traditional outfits.

unnormalised: The event is being held at their Mumbai residence, Antilia. Security is supposed to be tight, starting from 12:00 noon on 20/10/2024, so don't even think about gatecrashing! Expect traffic snarls around Altamount Road that evening.
normalised: The event is being held at their Mumbai residence, Antilia. Security is supposed to be tight, starting from twelve zero zero noon on twentieth October two thousand and twenty four, so don't even think about gatecrashing! Expect traffic snarls around Altamount Road that evening.

unnormalised: Apparently, the guest list includes names like SRK, Deepika, and Ranveer. The buzz is that there will be special performances, with the entertainment segment going on till at least 1:00 AM. Insider says catering will be a mix of traditional Indian and international cuisines.
normalised: Apparently, the guest list includes names like S-R-K, Deepika, and Ranveer. The buzz is that there will be special performances, with the entertainment segment going on till at least one zero zero A-M. Insider says catering will be a mix of traditional Indian and international cuisines.

unnormalised: This year's Diwali party is especially anticipated since last year's celebrations were scaled down. So mark your calendars for 20/10/24; the 'who's who' of India will definitely be there, dressed to the nines!
normalised: This year's Diwali party is especially anticipated since last year's celebrations were scaled down. So mark your calendars for twentieth October two thousand and twenty four; the 'who's who' of India will definitely be there, dressed to the nines!
